errors.ffmpeg_not_found: FFmpeg not found. Install with: brew install ffmpeg
errors.binary_not_found: Whisper binary not found. Rebuild Docker image: docker-compose build --no-cache
errors.model_not_found:
Whisper model not found: {{path}}
Rebuild Docker image: docker-compose build --no-cache
errors.no_speech_detected: No speech detected in audio. Check if the audio contains clear speech or try a longer audio.
errors.binary_incompatible: Whisper binary incompatible or missing. Rebuild: docker-compose build --no-cache
